// The indentations are with tabs!

// Game
// Game: (Red|Blue|Yellow)
Game: Red

// Images // TODO
// Image: <alias> <image path>

// Aliases // TODO
// TrainerAlias: <alias> <trainerID> // alias is how you name him, trainerID is how the application knows him as

// Custom trainers
// Trainer: <name> [:: <location>] :: <alias> <name>:<level> [..] // ID will be generated by the application (?)
Trainer: Rival 1 :: Pallet Town :: rival1 bulbasaur:5
Trainer: Bug Catcher 1 :: Viridian Forest :: bug1 weedle:9
Trainer: Brock :: Pewter City :: brock geodude:12 onix:14

// Vermilion Gym
Trainer: Surge :: Vermilion City :: surge voltorb:21 pikachu:18 raichu:24


// Route
Route: Red Any% Glitchless - Paras%
	S: Early game
		GetP: #squirtle:5
		B: rival1
			Tail Whip x1-2, then Tackle until it faints.
		D: Do parcel stuff
		D: Kill an encounter
		E: Route 1 :: 1:0 3:1 4:0 5:0
			Kill an encounter
		B: bug1
			Tail Whip x2, then Tackle until it faints.
	S: Pewter City
		B: brock
			Bubble all
	S: Route 3
		B: bug2
		B: shorts
		B: bug3
		B: bug4
		C: Route 3 :: #1
	S: Mt Moon
		M: Mt.Moon:B2F :: 6 :: 14 15 14 3
			Manip a Paras Lv.12, DVs should be 14/15/14/3
		Swap: 0 2
		D: Teach TM34 Bide
		TM: Bide // TEMPORARY
		B: nerd1
		E: Mt.Moon:1F :: 0:0 1:0 2:0 3:1 4:0
			You need 98 total exp, kill two 6-9 Zubats or one 8 Geodude (98 exactly) before Hiker
		B: lassmoon
		B: hikermoon
		E: Mt.Moon:B2F :: 3:1
		B: rocketmoon
		B: nerd2
	S: Cerulean City
		B: rival2
	S: Nugget Bridge
		B: bug5
		Candy: 2
			Rare Candy to level 20 // TEMPORARY
		B: lass1
		B: youngster1
		B: lass2
		B: jrtrm1
		B: rocket1
	S: Route 25
		B: hiker1
		B: lass3
		B: jrtrm2
		B: lass4
	S: Cerulean City (Gym)
		B: rocketdig
		TM: Dig :: Bide
		B: jrtrfmisty
		B: misty
	S: Underground & Route 6
		D: Pick up full restore
		C: Route 6 :: #0
			Catch an oddish if you need to
		B: jrtrf1
		B: jrtrm3
	S: SS Anne
		D: Go to the left and go in the fourth room
		B: youngster2
		D: Grab TM08 behind him, then leave and go upstairs, go in the fourth room on the right
		D: Menu ...
		TM: Body_Slam :: Stun_Spore
		B: gentleman1
		B: rival3
		TM: Cut :: Scratch // do this?
	S: Vermilion Gym
		B: surge
	S: Route 9
	S: Rock Tunnel
